Jeśli ktoś będzie chciał to dostanie pliki mapy.

Worst game ive ever played in my entire life yet I still come back every year.

The game has improved a lot lately. Here's some things I like and dislike about it in it's current state:

Like:
+ There's almost no cheaters in the game, at least at my skill level (unless they are hiding it very well).
+ The new matchmaking with 1v1 warmups (which could be longer)
+ The community has gotten better. I don't encounter that many toxic players. Compared to Valorant CSGO community is sunshine and rainbows. 
+ A good old CS experience

Dislike:
- Matchmaking is a bit all over the place. It's very common to see a spread of 3-5 ranks between players.
- Some guns seem way too overpowered (looking at you, Negev)
- Why is Cache not in Active Duty? BRING BACK CACHE.
- There's way too many skins in the game.
Мне нравиться, в начале сложновато но потом набираешься опыта и игра идет норм. Много читеров. Но играть можно
